Tea with Elvis at Belle Grove Plantation at Port Conway
data.meta_description: Tea with Elvis Hosted By Belle Grove Plantation at Port Conway. Event starts on Saturday, 24 August 2024 and happening at Belle Grove Plantation at Port Conway, Port Royal, VA. Register or Buy Tickets, Price information.
data.text:
Saturday, August 24th

Sunday, August 25th

1pm

He‚Äôs just a hunk a hunk of burning love! And he will be your ‚ÄúTeddy Bear‚Äù for the afternoon as Belle Grove Plantation hosts Elvis for Afternoon Tea.

Turn back the clock to the 1960s when the King of Rock and Roll ruled Las Vegas strip. Enjoy delights made from recipes favored by the Elvis. Enjoy your cup of afternoon tea while Elvis sings about ‚ÄúHeartbreak Hotel‚Äù and asks if you are ‚ÄúLonely Tonight‚Äù.

By far one of our most popular afternoon tea events. Don‚Äôt wait, tickets will go fast!

Our Tea with Elvis is in such high demand, we will have the King with us for two days!

Tickets

Advance Tickets for Saturday or Sunday ‚Äì On or before Sunday, July 24th ‚Äì $45.00

Tickets for Saturday or Sunday ‚Äì After Sunday, July 25th ‚Äì $55.00

Cancellation

You may cancel your tickets for a full refund on or before July 24th ‚Äì After July 16th or no shows Tickets are non-refundable

Children

We love having all ages at Belle Grove for Afternoon Tea. But we would like to limit the youngest to 5 and older please.

Dietary Concerns

Due to the nature of Afternoon Tea, we are sorry, but we are not able to accommodate gluten-free, sugar free or dairy free diets for this event.

Table Settings

We work hard to place all family and friends together. You may need to share a table with other guests as well. Please let us know the names in your group when we send our second confirmation email. If you don't inform us before the event, we will not be able to move you the day of.

You may also like the following events from Belle Grove Plantation at Port Conway:

This Saturday, 17th August, 12:00 pm, On the Rocks Sipping and Painting Class in Port Royal

This Saturday, 17th August, 07:00 pm, Paranormal Lockdown - August 17th - Hosted by FPRI in Port Royal

This month, 31st August, 10:00 am, Meditation Workshop 101 With Kim Sage at Belle Grove Plantation in Port Royal
